A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is full of ambiguity\, tension\, and adventure. It is everything that makes SW great but then takes it in a new and exciting direction. Some people may not appreciate that this is about going in a new direction. The line between darkness and lightness is not as well defined and old and new alliances are shifted. The writing\, the delivery and acting were worth it and I'd recommend it highly.
